nodes.text: Colla IV was a planet located in the galaxy's Inner Rim, in grid square N-9 on the Standard Galactic Grid where droidekas were manufactured by the Colicoids, while the droid tri-fighter's three-armed design mimicked the skull features of one of its ferocious predators.

Colla IV was first mentioned in Star Wars: Episode I The Visual Dictionary, a Star Wars Legends reference book written by David West Reynolds that was released on May 26, 1999. It became canon when it was mentioned in Star Wars Journeys: The Phantom Menace, an iOS mobile game that was released on April 22, 2014.
